title: Senior Data Scientist
required_skills:
Machine Learning, 
Big Data Technologies, 
Data Visualization.

description:
Experiences Proven experience in managing deadlines in a fast-paced agile environment delivering quality ad-hoc reporting and analysis while meeting strategic project deadlines and expectations. Demonstrated ability to cleanse manage interrogate and manipulate large data sets. Experience in leveraging open source tools predictive analytics machine learning and other data techniques to perform analyses for both product development teams and customers. Track record developing and updating dashboards intended to track product performance and related trends. Proven experience in report writing QA and working with development teams on move-to-production process. Extensive experience leveraging open source tools predictive analytics machine learning and other data techniques to perform complex analyses for project work.

Qualifications Ability to execute data analysis and modeling directly and with expediency with relevant tools. Critical Thinker; you don’t just follow the common wisdom but can think critically to determine which tactics ideas and objectives are right for our data operations to scale. Ability to speak technically with engineers on data structures and data types and work in partnership to develop customer solutions. Effective Communicator who works well with both internal and external customers. A
